name: Driver Truck Cargo 3D
description:
Driving is an art or Skill? But driving Truck Cargo 3d certainly requires both. Jump behind the steering wheel of your own truck! In this classic 3D parking simulation game you will be judged by your driving skills by parking your truck properly. So if you love 3D parking games with a little twist you definitely need to download this new truck parking game. If you haven't played any of our other 3D truck simulators you will still enjoy the new game play. This 3D parking game is not so easy as its predecessors, you really need to show your driving skills in the truck. With over 15 new different 3D parking game simulator missions you will have the time of your life.

Game Features:

Transport a variety of cargos across different US cities
Own, customize and upgrade trucks including American and European classics
Advance and unlock new missions with different cargo and better payouts
Realistic fuel consumption, truck and cargo collisions which affect your wage
Experience open world gameplay and compete with your friends in global rankings
Real physics and smooth touch and tap control to drive smooth car
3 huge oil tanker, dump and car transporter for ultimate driver experience.
